articles.author: Charles Pulliam-Moore
articles.title: Mission: Impossible – Dead Reckoning Part One review: when self awareness goes wrong - The Verge
articles.description: Paramount’s Mission: Impossible – Dead Reckoning Part One — in theaters July 12th — can’t stop getting in its own way with an overabundance of meta-humor.
articles.content:
Paramounts seventh Mission: Impossible is the franchises biggest, silliest, and most stunt-filled Tom Cruise delivery system yet. But its self-awareness is more of a bug than a welcome feature.

articles.title: Red, White & Royal Blue's steamy gay trailer sends fans wild - PinkNews
articles.description: After what feels like an eternity, Prime Video has finally dropped the eagerly-anticipated trailer for queer rom com Red, White & Royal Blue.
articles.content:
